name: John Schuster
message: Goof luck on the next step of your Journey

name: John Schuster
message: Too bad "The Grid" wasn't open in time for your party but let's plan to go there after they open.

name: Khagendra Uprety
message: Hi Jim, As you’re starting a new phase in life, I pray God opens new stage of opportunities and strength for you. Farewell boss!
